results.doc_title: InComm / HelloFresh Tech Integration  - 2025/12/08 09:27 EST - Notes by Gemini
results.project_name: InComm / HelloFresh Tech Integration - Retail Gift Card Program
results.owner: Nikita Gorshkov (HelloFresh - New Ventures Lead), Laura Titherington (InComm Canada - Business Development)
results.target_date: Not specified - Legal review delayed until January 2025 due to December 1st deadline miss
results.summary: HelloFresh is integrating with InComm to launch a new retail gift card program across North America (US and Canada). The integration involves a transferred value activation process where physical gift cards are activated at retail, and consumers use PINs to redeem value through HelloFresh's system via InComm's API. Key discussions covered technical requirements for PIN validation, redemption flows, error handling, reporting capabilities, and contract negotiations for a potential unified North American agreement.

must_have: Transferred value activation process for physical gift cards
IAB barcode scanning for retailer activation
Value validation and transfer API integration
Error handling with specific timeout thresholds
Retry/cancel recommendations for 'get status' and 'redeem' requests
Reporting data including merchant name and location for analytics
nice_to_have: Single North American contract (instead of separate US/Canada agreements)
Similar launch timelines for US and Canada markets
out_of_scope: HelloFresh involvement in initial card activation at retail

decisions.rationale: Provides flexibility for different purchase amounts

decisions.what: Explore single North American agreement instead of separate US/Canada contracts
decisions.rationale: Reduce procurement workload, enable similar launch timelines, simplify legal review process
decisions.approved_by: Elysa Viti, Elaine Tobin (requested); Laura Titherington (to investigate)

decisions.what: Hold contract sending until North American agreement decision is made
decisions.rationale: Avoid unnecessary work if contract structure changes

decisions.what: Legal review and finalization postponed to January 2025
decisions.rationale: Request submitted after December 1st deadline; legal team unavailable until January

technical: InComm API for PIN validation and redemption
team: HelloFresh US/Factor gift card team (Elaine Tobin)
external: InComm (payment processor and gift card platform provider)
Retail partners (for card activation at point of sale)
Costco (specific program economics to be finalized)

success_metrics: Merchant name and location data availability for analytics
Error handling success rate within timeout thresholds
Successful PIN validation and redemption transaction completion
